member.name: F:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.application.xml.MathML.actiontypes.tooltip
member.summary: When the pointer moves over the expression, a tooltip box with a message is displayed near the expression. The syntax Is: ``<maction actiontype = "tooltip"> expression message </maction>``.

member.summary: 因为反序列化存在一个元素顺序的bug，所以在这里不可以通过反序列化来进行表达式的解析

example as: ``f(x) = x ^ 2``

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.application.xml.MathML.maction
member.summary: The MathML ``<maction>`` element provides a possibility to bind actions to (sub-) expressions. The action itself is specified by the actiontype attribute, which accepts several values. To specify which child elements are addressed by the action, you can make use of the selection attribute.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.application.xml.XPath
member.summary: 1. ``nodename`` 选取此节点的所有子节点。 2. ``/`` 从根节点选取。 3. ``//`` 从匹配选择的当前节点选择文档中的节点，而不考虑它们的位置。 4. ``.`` 选取当前节点。 5. ``..`` 选取当前节点的父节点。 6. ``@`` 选取属性。

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.MIME.application.xml.SelectByNodeName
member.summary: 选取此节点的所有子节点。
